docs.title: Home
docs.text:
BASIS POINTS PODCAST Markets. Operators. No fluff.

With James, Haik, and George — plus an AI co-host that can summarize, extract takeaways, and answer questions about the show.

Ask the AI See highlights J James Host H Haik Co-host G George Co-host Tip: this site is built to deploy on GitHub Pages. Because easy wins are still wins. AI Co-Host

Ask questions, get summaries, pull quotes, or generate show notes. (Demo mode by default — no API keys, no drama.)

Suggested prompts 60-second summary Top takeaways Quotable lines Disagreements LinkedIn draft AI mode Use live API (optional) Demo mode is gorgeous and safe. Live mode requires wiring an API endpoint. Basis Points AI Ask me anything about the podcast. I’m basically the fourth host, but with fewer opinions and better memory. Send Note: In demo mode, responses are simulated. In live mode, this calls /api/chat (you can implement later). Highlights

Short, sharp, and actually useful. Like a basis point: small unit, big consequences.

Takeaway “The difference between a good decision and a great one is usually the second-order effects you bothered to model.” — placeholder quote Framework “If you can’t explain the tradeoff, you don’t understand the strategy.” — placeholder quote Operator note “Most ‘market insights’ are just vibes. We prefer receipts.” — placeholder quote Listen

Drop your embed links here (Spotify/Apple/YouTube). For now, enjoy this tasteful placeholder box.

Featured Episode Embed player goes here Get the next episode

When we publish, you’ll know. No spam. No motivational quotes. Just signal.
